definition: to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
legendary grass conferring invisibility/fig. to conceal oneself or one's plans
erhua variant of 隱身草|隐身草[yin3 shen1 cao3]

sentences.english: I think it's time to get my dad's old cloak out again.
sentences.chinese: 我想是再次使用我爸爸的隐身衣的时候了。

sentences.english: The influence of radar stealth technology on the penetration ability of anti-ship missile is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了雷达隐身技术对反舰导弹突防能力的影响。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the stealth of target by nonuniform unmagnetized plasmas.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不均匀非磁化等离子体片的目标隐身。

sentences.english: He said that the Invisible Man was after him.
sentences.chinese: 他说隐身人跟在他后面。

sentences.english: Most of the invisibility cloaks that have been demonstrated to date conceal objects at frequencies that are not detectable by the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 大部分隐身斗篷都是在非可见光波段隐藏物体。

sentences.english: Rogues can backstab and hide to further their ends.
China's early F-14 program, including a small amount of stealth technology.
sentences.chinese: 而中国早期歼14计划，包含了少量的隐身技术。

sentences.english: His success is partly because of magic tools like an invisibility cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他的成功，部分原因是由于魔法工具，如隐身衣。

sentences.english: That can be useful in group ambushes or surprise attacks.
sentences.chinese: 在埋伏和奇袭的时候隐身是很有用的。

sentences.english: But stealth technology can’t make an aircraft fully invisible .
sentences.chinese: 但隐形技术并不能使得飞机完全隐身。

sentences.english: Stealth is to escape, then whether the on-line is looking forward to.
sentences.chinese: 隐身是为了逃避，那么上线是否是在期待。

sentences.english: How can you be seen with me when I'm wearing the cloak of invisibility?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能看到我，当我穿着隐身衣呢？

sentences.english: A segmentation design approach for the cloak of arbitrary shape is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于分割法的任意形状隐身衣的设计方案。

sentences.english: According to this traits , we made carbon cluster-like microwave stealth material .
sentences.chinese: 利用该特性制得了碳团簇型微波隐身材料。

sentences.english: Related cloaks have been made to work with infrared rays and visible light.
sentences.chinese: 并已制造了可在红外光和可见光波段工作的隐身器件。

sentences.english: We mainly study the radiation characters of stealth objects.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了隐身目标的毫米波辐射特性。

definition: to slink/to move stealthily/to advance through the water
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to pretend to be (asleep etc)/to disguise oneself as/pretense/disguise/(military) to camouflage/camouflage
to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
